author: jshlee
body:
#### PR description:
  - DAQ dataformat is updated to the current version used in P5
  - GEM unpacked is changed to only produce digis when there are not DAQ errors
  - new DAQ status classes that checks for DAQ errors and stores it for OnlineDQM
  - run3 GE1/1 cannot read multi-BX, so by default non zero BX will not be unpacked for run3
  - added multi-BX mode for phase2
  - added plugin that checks if output the packing and unpacking is identical to the original simDigis
  - Discussed in the minutes of https://indico.cern.ch/event/1056074/#32-dpg 
  - Link to presentation at GEM operations (https://indico.cern.ch/event/1058368/contributions/4448079/subcontributions/345162/attachments/2283335/3881798/gem_unpacker_20210719.pdf)

#### PR validation:

Validated with wf 11634.0 and 34611.0

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Will need to be backported to CMSSW_11_3_X for use on current cosmic runs
title: GEM unpacker - updated DAQ dataformat and new DAQ status collections
